ResearchProjectDef.label: UN Colonization Programm
ResearchProjectDef.description: Opening of the United Nations Colonization Program's recommendations and technologies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction A
ResearchProjectDef.description: This essential research allows the construction of Concrete Buildings, Glass and essential structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction B
ResearchProjectDef.description: This military research allows the production of Armored Walls and Doors, essential to build bunkers and camouflaged defense positions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction C
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research allows the construction of advanced Walls and Doors using the strongest materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power A
ResearchProjectDef.description: This essential research allows the construction of Chemfuel Generators and refinery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power B
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research allows the production of advanced and armored Chemfuel Generators.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power C
ResearchProjectDef.description: This advanced research allows the production of High Pressure Hydrogen and Hydrogen Fuel Cells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Furniture A
ResearchProjectDef.description: This essential research allows the construction of essential furniture, lights, research and medical equipments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Furniture B
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research allows the construction of advanced furniture, medical, research and surgery equipments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Furniture C
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research allows the construction of advanced furniture and equipments.
